home-description: Team player, hard learner, result driven!
about-description-p1: Hi, I’m Andrius, in 2022 I decided to change career path and turn to software development. In July I decided to quit my job as production manager and started to study on my own. Then decided to attend Java course, and successfully finished after 4 months in January, 2023. After graduation, continue learning of Spring and React, also Quality Assurance tools and technologies. In 2023 March got in to Sourcery Academy for Developers, up to the end of May, 2023. Looking for any opportunities in TECH field.
about-description-p2: Main interests are traveling, cooking, books, movies, various sport, but mostly basketball, football and Formula 1. Spending quality time with family and friends. Also outdoors, especialy wild camping, canoeing, hicking, gathering mushrooms, fishing.
